description: First time on the market since new & lovingly maintained by original owners!  Tucked away at the back of the complex, this lovely home has a fully fenced south facing back yard, a single car garage, plus a car pad, and ample interior/exterior storage.  It has a traditional 2 level floor plan with the main floor featuring an eat in kitchen, formal DR, a cozy LR opening up to one of 3 outdoor spaces & a powder room for guests. 3 generous size bedrooms upstairs, primary with ensuite, WIC & a private balcony with City and Water Views!  Keith Court is a self-managed complex with a new roof (2019) is located within walking distance to Lonsdale amenities & is in the Ridgeway & Sutherland catchment areas.  Original but mint condition - Move in as is, or update to your style
